Rewards Rate: 4 RPs from 1st to 4th Transaction, 8 RPs from 5th to 10th Transaction and After That 10 RPs for Each Transaction
Reward Redemption: RPs Can Be Redeemed for Cash Credit, AirMiles or at IndusMoments
Insurance Benefits: Air Accident Cover up to Rs. 1 Lakh

product_details: This is a virtual credit card.
You will get a Zomato Gold 3-Month membership as a welcome benefit with this card.
You earn increasing Reward Points after a set of transactions, and after the 10th transaction in a statement cycle, you get 10 RPs on each transaction.
